name: Project Regolith
description:
Explore the Mystery of Outpost Rhea

Project Regolith is a 2-Player Cooperative Puzzler made by a small team of 4 in Melbourne, Australia, where you and a partner are tasked with uncovering the mystery behind the vanished crew of Outpost Rhea, a deep-space research facility overseen by a Corporate body that enforces strict NDA clauses and communications embargoes amongst it's employees.


The rules of time and space are breaking down aboard the station. Communication is key, as the two of you might not be seeing the same thing. Were those walls there before? Did the door just move? Wait, are you walking on the ceiling!?




The station's research has led to some bizarre anomalies that have begun to warp environments on a whim - Explore a series of non-Euclidean puzzles together with your partner to uncover the fate of Outpost Rhea and the experiment at the heart of it all - Project Regolith.

KEY FEATURES

  • 2 Player Coop Puzzling - Team up with a partner, friend, enemy, stranger, or anything in-between to uncover the mystery behind Project Regolith.
  • Non-Euclidean Spaces - As the anomalies plaguing Outpost Rhea worsen, you'll come across warped spaces that defy physics, and objects that defy your senses.
  • The Lives of Rhea's Crew - Learn more about the major players aboard Outpost Rhea, from the station's Executive Director, to the humble catering staffers. Thirty (30) collectible Audio Logs tell the story of the station, and help shed light on the experiments aboard the station, and the lives of the crew affected by them. Voiced by an incredibly talented cast made possible by our Kickstarter backers!
